“From Lake Superior to the Mall of America, Minnesota is home to exceptional tourist destinations, but as travel has been limited during the coronavirus pandemic, the tourism industry has been hit particularly hard.”

Even before the pandemic, communities in rural Minnesota were struggling with access to affordable housing, child care and broadband.

I will always keep working to make sure our rural communities are heard and get the help they need.

“I know what my constituents care about — and that is they are afraid of losing their health care in the middle of the pandemic...

"People's lives depend on the Affordable Care Act.

.@TheRealDratch you play a good me. But who would you have play Senator Cruz?

Sen. Klobuchar sent a letter to the Consumer Product Safety Commission urging it to take action to protect children from the hazard presented by Mystical Fire flame colorants. In MN, 4 people have been sickened from ingesting the product, whose packaging looks like candy.

Sen. Klobuchar & @SenJohnThune’s Sports Medicine Licensure Clarity Act has  passed the Senate Health, Labor, Education & Pensions Committee. The legislation would make clear that covered sports medicine professionals can treat injured players on the road. @HELPCmteDemsSen

Sen. Klobuchar urged pharma company GSK to take action to alleviate the shortage of its shingles vaccine. Every year, there are 1 million cases of shingles & 1/3 of adults will get the disease sometime in their life. The @CDCgov recommends all adults over 50 receive the vaccine.

Today, Sen. Klobuchar’s Career & Technical Education Research & Outreach Act was passed by the Senate Health, Education, Labor and Pensions Committee. The bill will help educate students about opportunities for in-demand jobs by involving teachers, counselors & parents.

Sen. Klobuchar & @SenThomTillis’ legislation to help veterans who have been exposed to toxic burn pits has passed the Senate! It would create a center of excellence within the VA to better understand the health effects of burn pits & treat veterans who become sick after exposure

The #FarmBill includes many of Sen. Klobuchar’s priorities, including: the creation of an animal disease & disaster response program to help address risks to animal health, livestock export markets & industry economic stability, & prevent another outbreak like the 2015 Avian flu

Sen. Klobuchar & @SenatorMenendez's Firefighter Cancer Registry Act passed the Senate! This bipartisan legislation will create a national cancer registry & provide the information we need to protect our firefighters from health risks
